mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM user_db AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_relation AS ur ON u.sid = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission_relation AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.sid = #{sid}

select per.* from sys_request_path path join sys_request_path_permission_relation as urlper on path.id = urlper.url_id join sys_permission as per on per.id = urlper.permission_id where path.url = #{requestUrl}
